section.p: Call this method to push external audio frames through an audio track.

section.title: Timing
section.p:
Before calling this method to push external audio data, perform the following steps:
Call to create an audio track and obtain the audio track ID.
When calling , set publishCustomAudioTrackId in to the ID of the audio track you want to publish, and set publishCustomAudioTrack to .

Before calling this method to push external audio data, perform the following steps:
Call to create an audio track and obtain the audio track ID.
When calling to join a channel, set publishCustomAudioTrackId in to the audio track ID you want to publish, and set publishCustomAudioTrack to .

Before pushing external audio data using this method, perform the following steps:
Call to create an audio track and obtain the audio track ID.
When calling to join a channel, set publishCustomAudioTrackId in to the ID of the audio track you want to publish, and set publishCustomAudioTrack to .

Before calling this method to push external audio data, perform the following steps:
Call to create an audio track and obtain the audio track ID.
When calling to join a channel, set publishCustomAudioTrackId in to the ID of the audio track you want to publish, and set publishCustomAudioTrack to .

plentry.pd: The audio track ID. If you want to publish a custom external audio source, set this parameter to the custom audio track ID you want to publish.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
